content.rendered:
Engineering the Future of Robotics

The Robotics Summit & Expo is a multifaceted educational forum and expo dedicated to addressing the issues involved with the design, development, manufacture and delivery of commercial robotics and intelligent systems products and services.

The program of keynotes and general sessions are designed to provide professionals the information they need to successfully develop the next generation of commercial robotics systems.

Register Now
View Agenda


Conference will start in…

Keynote Speakers

Kevin Blankespoor

Vice President and General Manager of Warehouse Robotics | Boston Dynamics

Brian Gerkey

Co-founder and CEO | Open Robotics

Discover Solutions for Designing, Developing & Manufacturing Robots

The Expo at the Robotics Summit provides attendees with hands-on access to the latest design and development solutions for producing robotics and intelligent systems products and services. Gain access to new and exciting concepts in robotics, and see examples of how to put your ideas in motion.

Exhibit Sponsorship Opportunities
The Robotics Summit is a new and unique sales, branding and marketing opportunity for companies offering products, technologies and services that support the development of advanced robotics systems, and which assist technical professionals in bringing the next generation of robotics solutions to market.

Learn More


2022 Co-located Events

The Healthcare Robotics Engineering Forum focuses on accelerating the design, development, and manufacturing of next-generation healthcare robotics systems. Healthcare Robotics Engineering Forum attendees can access to the Robotics Summit & Expo conference and exhibition.

DeviceTalks Boston is a premier medtech event that attracts 1,000-plus medtech community professionals looking to explore the trends and technology that are shaping the future of the medical device industry. An essential meeting for entrepreneurs, engineers, and other professionals developing the latest tools used to treat patients and cure disease.

Special Events

MassRobotics Career Fair
 Free access to career fair for individuals seeking careers and companies seeking talent in the fields of robotics and AI/machine learning.
 

Learn More

Robotics Design for Additive Manufacturing Workshop
Join HP 3D Printing for a unique workshop on designing for HP’s Multi Jet Fusion (MJF) technology to accelerate time to market, drive down cost, and deliver quality parts.
 

Learn More

Test Drive Spot
 Attendees will have an opportunity to drive Spot at the Robotics Summit & Expo. Spaces will be limited for this unique experience and will be able to be booked through the event app.

Learn More

Register Today

Join us May 10-11 at the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center for the return of Robotics Summit & Expo!

Register Now
